name: Idle Slaughter lnc
description:
Welcome to the Slaughter House! In here, you will raise cows and fatten them, and then sell their fresh meat all over the world. In return, you will receive cash that you can use to expand your factories! Becoming the wealthiest cow tycoon has never been this easy! Your slaughter house will offer the best quality beef to consumers all over the world!

Characteristics of Idle Slaughter House:
• Hire cowboys to take care of calves and make sure they thrive!
• Cut the beef with machines in your factory!
• Manage your factory and make the work flow automated!
• Run the food square and cook food with beef to expand your industrial chain!

Build an automated slaughter house and begin this easy and casual simulation game to fully release the potential of your brain! And become the most profitable factory owner in history!

We are working very hard to perfecting it, so if you run into any issues while playing or you have any suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at slaughterluc.zero@gmail.com.
